title: Unity 3D Programming
highlights: Built 2D/3D scenes, prefabs, UI, and animation controllers in Unity.
Scripted gameplay in C# (input, state machines, events, timers).
Integrated assets, optimized builds, and used Git branches for teamwork.
Final Project: Kill Your Veggies multiplayer game, subtitles, and cutscenes.

title: UX Research & UX Design
highlights: Planned and ran user research (surveys + interviews).
Converted insights into personas and user journeys.
Defined problem statement and core success metrics.
Built Cinema XXI replica in Figma.
